posts.subject: 8chans images
posts.body: So i didnt use 8chan for stuff like pol but what i did use it for was pornthreads that i had bookmarked for future use. Is there a way to get ahold of the images from 8chan or am i fucked? think the images will be back if 8chan comes up or will they be 404?

>>f22615d5-0f47-4c2c-bd33-ed26ed3cac11
>>5a9335cd-a51a-4e2d-a625-1948273b21b2
Thanks bros
anyone know what the best way to download all images in a thread is? original plan was to click expand images then rightclick and save the site but it takes alot of time for it to expand the images and sometimes it seems to fail to expand the last 20-30% images. opening them all individualy and then ctrl+s each one of them is obviously going to take too long.
How the hell do i mass download images? If someone posts multiple images and i press "download all" it says its archiving or something but i dont know where they are stored localy?
